 For Sale: 3 room, 85 sq.m flat at 5(6)floor at Saburtalo str 53 (S. The flat is old renovated. toilets-bathroom and kitchen newly renovated with tiles and built in kitchen furniture.  Could be sold with furniture, At sale the cosmetic refurbishing will be provided included in price Price: $70000
